channel.title: [GLITCH] Falling through the train (On a Rail)
channel.description:
An interesting glitch occured. I had just gotten on the train and went through the ramp where a guard told me to find the rocket. I proceeded to the elevator and while moving, I did a quicksave. I exited, came back later and loaded the saved game. Everything was smooth until I accidentally tried to increase the train's throttle which is when the train appeared on the top of the elevator shaft (the elevator was still further down, descending) and I fell through, recieving a minor fracture.
![](upload://bLJJ3FYakQ6BM9aYraVmHAW6yd2.jpeg)
Some errors sitting in the console when I opened it up to get 'status' and 'getpos' outputs:[code] Loading game from SAVE\quick.sav... SOLID_VPHYSICS static prop with no vphysics model! (models/props_blackmesa/conduit_box.mdl) SOLID_VPHYSICS static prop with no vphysics model! (models/props_blackmesa/conduit_tube16l.mdl) SOLID_VPHYSICS static prop with no vphysics model! (models/props_blackmesa/conduit_tube90d.mdl) SOLID_VPHYSICS static prop with no vphysics model! (models/props_blackmesa/conduit_tube32l.mdl) SOLID_VPHYSICS static prop with no vphysics model! item.title: [GLITCH] Falling through the train (On a Rail)
item.dc:creator: proz0r
item.description:
Exactly my thoughts, Flying sheep

Read full topic
item.source: [GLITCH] Falling through the train (On a Rail)

item.title: [GLITCH] Falling through the train (On a Rail)
item.dc:creator: flying_sheep
item.description:
i can confirm it exactly like po0zor said: loading a game, then entering the train makes it glitch.

i think everyone can figure out the workaround, but bugs need to be reported

Read full topic
item.source: [GLITCH] Falling through the train (On a Rail)

item.title: [GLITCH] Falling through the train (On a Rail)
item.dc:creator: proz0r
item.description:
PlausibleSarge:

did you try waiting until the platform had completely stopped?

also, try not saving on moving platforms

Yep, simply not using the train while the elevator’s moving does the trick.

Read full topic
item.source: [GLITCH] Falling through the train (On a Rail)

item.title: [GLITCH] Falling through the train (On a Rail)

item.description:

also, try not saving on moving platforms

item.description:
An interesting glitch occured. I had just gotten on the train and went through the ramp where a guard told me to find the rocket. I proceeded to the elevator and while moving, I did a quicksave. I exited, came back later and loaded the saved game. Everything was smooth until I accidentally tried to increase the train’s throttle which is when the train appeared on the top of the elevator shaft (the elevator was still further down, descending) and I fell through, recieving a minor fracture.
